Package GameModel.Things.Items.Clothing

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Accessory
    An Accessory is something worn for style such as jewelry
    Belt
    A belt is an accessory that is worn around the waist
    Boots
    Boots are a more heavy-duty footwear
    Bottomwear
    Bottomwear is anything that is worn to cover the lower half a person's body
    Bracers
    Bracers are worn to cover and protect the arms
    Cape
    A cape is a decorative cloth worn on the back
    Chestpiece
    A chestpiece is armor that covers the chest
    Clothing
    Clothing is an item to be worn in an Outfit by a SimCharacter or RPGCharacter
    Footwear
    Footwear is clothing for the feet
    Hat
    A hat is a more stylish piece of headwear
    Headwear
    Headwear is clothing that is worn on the head.
    Helmet
    A helmet is a piece of armor to be worn on the head
    Leggings
    Leggings are a type of armor that covers the legs
    Pants
    Pants are a type of nonprotective bottom wear
    Shirts
    Shirts are a type of nonprotective topwear
    Shoe
    Shoes are a type of footwear
    Socks
    Socks are worn under shoes to keep the feet warm and absorb sweat
    Topwear
    Topwear is clothing that is to be worn on the upper half of the body
